content: f169 dovetail hat by quinn reverendo all efforts were made to make this pattern error-free for questions or support please email info@fairmountfibers com 11/8/21 © fairmount fibers ltd 2021 not to be reproduced or re-knit for profit page 1 of 3 f169 sizes us 6 / 4 0 mm 16 circular ndl medium 16 circumference unstretched to fit adult 20-21 us 7 / 4 5 mm 16 circular ndl and dpns or size to obtain x 7 5 deep gauge large 19 circumference unstretched to fit adult 21-22 x 9 - 10 ring markers one a unique color for bor 8 deep tapestry needle waste yarn materials manos del uruguay alegria grande 75% superwash gauge merino 25% polyamide approx 197 yds/100 g 1 skip mc 22 sts and 26 rounds = 4 in stockinette st knit all sts every round with larger needle size manos del uruguay alegria grande bocados 75% superwash merino 25% polyamide approx 49 yds/25 g 1 skip abbreviations each of colors a b and c bor beginning of round dpn double-pointed needle s size medium shown in ag21481 mauve mc with agb2600 k knit magenta a agb2193 cactus flower b and agb2419 k2tog knit 2 stitches together 1 stitch decreased oceano c m marker s mc main color size large shown in ag2241 sand mc with agb2102 ndl needle juanita a agb2363 tahiti b and agb2058 turmeric c p purl pm place marker rem remain ing repeat repeat round s round s slm slip marker st s stitch es notes brim is intended to be folded up pompom optional dovetail hat in size large shown in ag2241 sand mc with agb2102 juanita a agb2363 tahiti b and agb2058 turmeric c all efforts were made to make this pattern error-free for questions or support please email info@fairmountfibers com 11/8/21 © fairmount fibers ltd 2021 not to be reproduced or re-knit for profit page 2 of 3 f169 instructions join b next 3 rnds *k1 with a k1 with b repeat from * to end using smaller ndl and mc cast on 90 110 sts place bor m break a and join in the round with b knit 3 rnds round 1 *k1 p1 repeat from * to end work round 1 ten thirteen times join c next 3 rnds *k1 with b k1 with c repeat from * to end knit one round break b work round 1 ten thirteen more times with c knit 3 rnds switch to larger ndl and knit 2 4 rnds rejoin mc next 3 rnds *k1 with c k1 with mc repeat from * work colorwork pattern for both sizes as follows to end break c join a next 3 rnds *k1 with mc k1 with a repeat from * to end shape crown break mc as you work the following shaping change to dpn when there with a knit 3 rnds are too few sts to fit around the circular needle size medium with mc knit 3 rnds decrease round
